mapper.insert: insert into statereport (id, PlatForm, FUnikey, FOrgAddr, FDestAddr, FSubmitTime, FFeeTerminal, FServiceUPID, FReportCode, FLinkID, FAckStatus, state, reason) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funikey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forgaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdestaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsubmittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffeeterminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fserviceupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freportcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fackstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update statereport set PlatForm = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUnikey = #{funikey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOrgAddr = #{forgaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDestAddr = #{fdestaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSubmitTime = #{fsubmittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFeeTerminal = #{ffeeterminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FServiceUPID = #{fserviceupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FReportCode = #{freportcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLinkID = #{flinkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAckStatus = #{fackstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, PlatForm, FUnikey, FOrgAddr, FDestAddr, FSubmitTime, FFeeTerminal, FServiceUPID, FReportCode, FLinkID, FAckStatus, state, reason from statereport where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, PlatForm, FUnikey, FOrgAddr, FDestAddr, FSubmitTime, FFeeTerminal, FServiceUPID, FReportCode, FLinkID, FAckStatus, state, reason from statereport
select FLinkID, FReportCode, FSubmitTime, FDestAddr,FOrgAddr,reason,id from statereport where state='0' limit 50
mapper.insert: insert into statereport (id, PlatForm, FUnikey, FOrgAddr, FDestAddr, FSubmitTime, FFeeTerminal, FServiceUPID, FReportCode, FLinkID, FAckStatus, state, reason) values ( (select replace(UUID(),'-','')), #{PlatForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FUnikey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FOrgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FDestAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FSubmitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FFeeTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FServiceUPID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FReportCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FLinkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAckStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
